name: AVAudioRoutingArbiter
desc: An object for configuring macOS apps to participate in AirPods Automatic Switching.

items.name: func begin(category: AVAudioRoutingArbiter.Category, completionHandler: (Bool, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Begins routing arbitration to take ownership of a nearby Bluetooth audio route.

items.name: enum AVAudioRoutingArbiter.Category
items.desc: Categories that describe the general nature of your app’s audio use.

items.name: func leave()
items.desc: Stops an app’s participation in audio routing arbitration.
